Headline: #36 Broadway and #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Devon/Wayne
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway & 151 Sheridan buses are temp rerouted via Clark & Arthur Terminal, Clark, Peterson, Hollywood and Broadway due to street blockage near Devon/Wayne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark & Arthur Terminal, Clark, Peterson, Hollywood and Broadway due to street blockage near Devon/Wayne.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute near Devon/Wayne
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses rrtd EB via Devon, Clark, Pratt, Ashland & Morse; WB via Morse, Sheridan, Broadway, Hollywood, Peterson, Clark & Devon nr Devon/Wayne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Devon/Wayne.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Devon, Clark, Pratt, Ashland & Morse.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Morse, Sheridan, Broadway, Hollywood, Peterson, Clark & Devon.

Allow extra travel time.
